DOC.brief_summary: This study design test : 1. patient negative positron-emission tomography ( PET ) 2 cycle BEACOPPesc chemotherapy : whether number cycle reduce without compromise progression free survival ( PFS ) ( 2 cycle vs. 6 cycle ) 2. patient positive PET 2 cycle : whether intensify BEACOPPesc chemotherapy add Rituximab improve PFS .
